Main functions

jointFWERControl

Calibration of joint Family-Wise error rate thresholds

posthocBySimesRcpp posthocBySimes

post hoc bound obtained from Simes' inequality

falseDiscoveryEnvelope

Confidence envelope for the False Discovery process

falseDiscoveryProportionControl

falseDiscoveryProportionControl

falseDiscoveryProportionEnvelope

falseDiscoveryProportionEnvelope

upperBoundFP

Upper bound for the number of false discoveries

testByRandomization

Randomization-based testing for equal means in two groups

Simulation functions

simulateEqui

Simulate Gaussian equi-correlated test statistics

simulateEquiByRandomization

Simulate equi-correlated test statistics by randomization

simulateToeplitz

Simulate Gaussian test statistics with Toeplitz covariance
